reuters.title: S/P DOWNGRADES BAKER INTERNATIONAL CORP, UPGRADES HUGHES TOOL CO, AFFECTS 840 MLN DLRS OF DEBT
reuters.body: Reliance Electric Co said its Reliance Industrial Co unit will redeem on April 10 all outstanding 7-1/4 pct debentures due 1996 and 9-5/8 pct debentures due 1994. Reliance Industrial will buy back the 7-1/4s at 101 plus accrued interest and the 9-5/8s at 102.344 plus accrued interest. Reliance Electric was a unit of Exxon Corp <XON> until December 30, 1986, when a group of investors took the company private in a leveraged buyout, a Reliance spokesman said. Reuter 
